block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Recalled C Fernando Lunar from Bowie of the Eastern League. SEATTLE MARINERS--Reassigned RHP Aaron Scheffer from New Haven of the Eastern League to Tacoma of the PCL. Reinstated LHP Rob Ramsay from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Joel Pineiro to Tacoma of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Promoted LHP Stevenson Agosto from Orlando of the Southern League to Durham of International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Activated RHP Ryan Glynn from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Darwin Cubillan to Pulaski of the Appalachian League.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Recalled C Fernando Lunar from Bowie of the Eastern League. SEATTLE MARINERS--Reassigned RHP Aaron Scheffer from New Haven of the Eastern League to Tacoma of the PCL. Reinstated LHP Rob Ramsay from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Joel Pineiro to Tacoma of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Promoted LHP Stevenson Agosto from Orlando of the Southern League to Durham of International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Activated RHP Ryan Glynn from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Darwin Cubillan to Pulaski of the Appalachian League.

National League METS--Purchased the contract of 2B Leandro Arias from Pittsfield of the New York-Penn League and placed him on the 15-day disabled list. FLORIDA MARLINS--Activated OF Cliff Floyd from the disabled list. Optioned INF Chris Clapinski to Brevard County of the FSL. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Placed 3B Aramis Ramirez on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Abraham Nunez from Nashville of the PCL. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Placed 2B Bret Boone on the 15-day disabled list Tuesday with a bruised right knee. Recalled INF Kevin Nicholson Las Vegas of the PCL. Announced the extention of their working agreement with the Mobile Bay Bears of the Southern League for four years through the 2004 season and the Fort Wayne Wizards of the Midwest League for two years through the 2002 season.
National Basketball Association DALLAS MAVERICKS--Traded F Cedric Ceballos and F John Wallace, G Eric Murdock and cash to the Detroit Pistons for F Christian Laettner and F Terry Mills.

National Football League GIANTS--Named Jay Robertson offensive quality coach. Signed T Chris Bober, LB O.J. Childress, DE Frank Ferrara, FB Michael Jones and TE Adam Young to the practice squad. JETS--Released WR Dwight Stone, LB J.J. Syvrud and CB Del Lee. Terminated the contract of OL John Hudson. Signed TE-S Bradford Banta, CB Earthwind Moreland, T Cornell Green and NT Maurice Anderson. Signed LB J.J. Syvrud, WR Yatil Green, RB Vaughn Sanders, T Jeff Pilon and DL Jon Michals to the practice squad. ARIZONA CARDINALS--Signed RB Clarence Williams to their practice squad. BALTIMORE RAVENS--Agreed to terms with LT Jonathan Ogden on six-year contract extension. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Signed OT Dan Best, LB Michael Hawkes, WR Kerry Hood and DE Gillis Wilson to the practice squad. CHICAGO BEARS--Signed DE Jerome King, CB Todd McMillon, C Brad Williams, RB Brian Edwards and TE Frank Leatherwood to the practice squad. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Waived RB Terry Kirby. Claimed RB Jamel White on waivers from the Indianapolis Colts. DENVER BRONCOS--Signed CB Jason Suttle and G Steve Herndon to the practice squad. DETROIT LIONS--Signed RB Mario Bates. Waived RB Ken Oxendine. Signed DT Alfonso Boone, WR Larry Foster, WR Andre Rono, and T Andy Vincent. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed WR Brad Freeman, WR Isaac Jones, DB Craig Miller and OT Josh Tucker to the practice squad. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Released C David Kempfert. Signed OL Jeff Smith off waivers. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Signed RB Patrick Pass, LB Olrick Johnson, DT Garrett Johnson and G Rob Gatrell to the practice squad. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Named T Jay Hagood, WR Mareno Philyaw, DE Bobby Setzer, TE Dave Stachelski, and LB Philip Ward to the practice squad. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed DE Kendrick Gholston, RB Thomas Hammer and WR Elijah Thurmon to the practice squad. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed C Grey Ruegamer, FB Dan Kreider, WR Demetrius Brown, DE Ernie Brown and S Nakia Codie to the practice squad. SAN DIEGO CHARGERS--Signed OL Wilbert Brown, OL Jason Thomas and LB Shannon Taylor to the practice squad. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed TE Shonn Bell, DT William Carr, WR Chafie Fields, WR, S Ronnie Heard, and G Tyrone Hopson. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Released DT Matt Keneley and CB Troy Saunders. TENNESSEE TITANS--Signed TE Jason Gavadza, TE Mike Leach, DT Rod Walker, WR Chris Coleman and C Craig Page to the practice squad.

National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES--Signed F Niklas Andersson. COLORADO AVALANCHE--Signed C Kelly Fairchild and C Joe Prpic. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS--Announced the retirement of Donald Crump, Chris Dundas, Terry Kelly, Ted Nikolaou, Ron Pringle and George Whyte from the advisory board.
